oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lettter to Raise Funds for the "B" Club
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Communications; Fund raising
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: James Ries, President of the Christian Brothers College "B" Club solicited funds from Alumni and friends to support the "B" Club and its charitable activities.
